name: WP-FrontlineSMS
author: Kaka E. Prakasa

sections.description: wordpress plugin to retrieve message from frontlinesms software (http://www.frontlinesms.com) , this plugin will create a widget to show the message
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload wp-frontlinesms directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place widget to the bar or adding shortcode [wp-frontlinesms] to a Post or Page
sections.faq:
What is FrontlineSMS?

Please visit www.frontlinesms.com

Should I have SMS modem to use it?

Yes you must to run the frontline sms

Why the widget interface is too bad?

because it is still in development.

can I join the wp-frontlinesms development?

Sure, you can fork wp-frontlinesms project at github
